channel.title: Geocaching, Vacation on Summitt Dweller's Blog

item.title: Roadtrip: Geowoodstock 2023
item.description: Geowoodstock 2023 (GC89GMX) and Kentucky’s oldest surviving geocache (GC39E) were the intended destinations of another epic roadtrip with gossamar on May 25-28, 2023. The route and cache count looked something like this: The green lines represent my “outbound” route while the red lines show my “return” route back from GC39E. The ordered list of caches and events found is available for download below. [ Geowoodstock Caches Found The GPS Maze at the top of the list was not found first, but it's listed that way.
